document_name: Decree no. 2010-729 (creating the National Committee on Climate Change)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/COG/2010/COG-2010-11-30-Decree no. 2010-729 (creating the National Committee on Climate Change)_7953ec188357b06d12b0e35c36f2402c.pdf
document_description: This decree creates the National Committee on Climate Change and details its composition, functioning and missions. Thematic groups will be in charge of looking into detail 1) Power; 2) industry; 3) transportation; 4) land use, land change and forestry; 5) waste; 6) adaptation and vulnerability; and 7) attenuation.
